data.text: @BradPitt_Tweets Brad & others with him(Leo, Clooney) in "the group" are well moraled and good hearted. These people will last in Hollywood. Also why Brad was justified & respected for threatening Weinstein. Someone had to do it, Chuck Norris wasn't there. Right people do the right things.

@BradPitt_Tweets Absolutely more important than what he is in! Humanitarian and generous above all else. That’s what makes a man.  Integrity, intelligence and humility all the best qualities in a person. What’s not to love about that? ❤️
